subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Saints were unable to protect an 18-point third-quarter lead Sunday, and Kansas City’s Ryan Succop kicked his team-record sixth field goal to lift the Chiefs to a 27-24 overtime victory.
snippet: The Saints were unable to protect an 18-point third-quarter lead Sunday, and Kansas City’s Ryan Succop kicked his team-record sixth field goal to lift the Chiefs to a 27-24 overtime victory.
